name: 網站流量技術操作與實務分析－Google Analytics
description: 本課程為大數據時代下的當紅話題，著重在介紹Google Analytics這項網路流量分析工具，課程內容包含了技術、分析、個案及相關的結合應用。透過實際的操作及個案相輔相成，得以最有效率地理解並習得Google Analytics操作應用。
goals: Understand the importance of digital marketing and traffic analysis.
Understand How to use Google Analytics  and Google AdWords basically
Utilize Google Analytics to collect Data and read important messages from business report.
Apply the Google Analytics to marketing.
